ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This research was supported by Schweizerischer Nationalfonds Synergia grant CRSII2_147689. Alpiq SA, Hydroexploitation SA and Grande Dixence SA provided the data used to calculate installation flushing. The Canton of Valais provided the data on sediment extraction. Two anonymous reviewers and Editor WÃ¼nneman provided very valuable comments on a previous version of this paper.
